about_the_game:
"Traitor's Gambit" is an exciting multiplayer shooter that immerses players in a world of deception, intrigue, and suspense. Dive into a challenging gaming experience based on communication, strategy, and teamwork. Assume the role of an Innocent, Detective, or Traitor and discover who is a friend or foe while battling for survival on a diverse map.

Key Features:

Versatile Roles: Each round presents new challenges as players are randomly assigned as Innocents, Detectives, or Traitors. Each role has its own unique abilities and objectives.

Communication and Deception: TTT thrives on player interaction. Coordinate with your team to expose the Traitors or master the art of deception to go unrecognized as a Traitor. Every voice channel becomes a battlefield of words as players attempt to uncover the truth.

Expansive Maps: Explore a variety of detailed maps. Each map offers a unique gaming experience and requires different strategies to survive.

Thrilling Game Rounds: The dynamics of each round change as players identify their roles and strive to achieve their objectives. Unpredictable twists and unexpected alliances make each game a unique experience.

name: Traitor's Gambit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 version 22H2
  • Processor: Intel - Core i5-9400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEFORCE GTX 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 version 23H2
  • Processor: Intel - Core i5-13400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEFORCE GTX 1080
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: "Traitor's Gambit" is a gripping multiplayer shooter filled with deception and suspense. Players take on roles like Innocents, Detectives, or Traitors, navigating diverse maps. With unique roles, expansive maps, and thrilling rounds, each game promises an unpredictable and dynamic experience.
